description: $9600, 1 billion and 80 percent. What do these numbers mean? Take the quiz and find out!
title: Now with 50 percent less Bitcoin: This week's Silicon Tally
teaser: $9600, 1 billion and 80 percent. What do these numbers mean? Take the quiz and find out!
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, Luis von Ahn, professor of computer science at Carnegie Mellon University and the CEO of Duolingo,  talks tech and takes the test.

Play along at home, below.
